name: Norwegian Full Flight | Helsinki to London-Gatwick | Boeing 737-800 (with ATC)
description:
A full length, full flight video with Norwegian onboard Boeing 737-800 EI-FJZ, operating flight D8370 from Helsinki to London-Gatwick on October 13 2017.

**Every moment of the flight included from terminal to terminal, ATC for entire flight**

BECOME AN INFLIGHT VIDEO VIP AT http://patreon.com/inflightvideo

PLEASE SUBSCRIBE FOR WEEKLY FULL FLIGHTSMY CAMERA GEAR: https://www.amazon.com/shop/inflightvideo
Airline: Norwegian Air International
Flight: D8370
Aircraft: Boeing 737-800 EI-FJZ
From: Helsinki (HEL)
To: London-Gatwick (LGW)
Departure: 17:39
Arrival: 18:19
Flight Time: 2:40
Seat: 7F
Flight Path: http://infl.it/d8370map

Our flight today begins in the terminal at Helsinki Airport, Finland.  We walk to the gate and are soon called for boarding of this afternoon's flight to London Gatwick.  We board a bus and are taken to a remote gate where we board our aircraft that will take us to London.  

We are soon cleared to start and pushback, and begin our taxi to the runway.  We are delayed slightly due to a technical fault with the aircraft's computers, but after a hold of around 10 minutes we are on our way again, and make a beautiful departure from Helsinki.  

We fly across Finland and Sweden, hitting a spot of turbulence as we climb away from Helsinki.  We cross Northern Germany and the Netherlands before crossing the North Sea towards the UK.  We commence our descent towards London and make a beautiful sunset approach, touching down on runway 08L on a gorgeous autumn evening.  We disembark the aircraft and exit the terminal.

0:06:32 At gate 50C waiting to board aircraft
0:10:21 Boarding bus to aircraft
0:11:32 Bus ride to aircraft
0:16:04 Boarding aircraft, taking seat in 7F

0:59:39 Flight map commences
1:06:27 Cabin view
1:08:48 Turbulence
1:10:03 Cabin view
1:41:48 Cabin view
2:35:23 Cabin view

3:32:44 Final approach to Gatwick
3:36:32 Landing runway 08R at Gatwick
3:46:49 Disembarking aircraft, walk through terminal to kerb
